//- - - - - - - - -//

9
//- - - - - - - - -//
Empty links are not allowed even with labels [[|Foo]].
//- - - - - - - - -//
<p>Empty links are not allowed even with labels [[|Foo]].</p>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//
10
//- - - - - - - - -//

//- - - - - - - - -//
<p>Empty labels are not allowed [[Foo|]].</p>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//
11
